content: type of instructions - written instructions only - no charts or photo tutorials - written using american standard crochet terms - no tutorial or crochet lessons are included skill level - advanced beginner - no tutorial or crochet lessons are included finished size - 3 75 inches approx - sizes will vary depending on the yarn and hook used yarn & hook - any scrap yarn - i used rico creative cotton aran - 3 5mm crochet hook or a hook that corresponds to your yarn languages - english only with no charts terms of use - for personal use only do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern refund policy - all digital sales are final about truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet patterns this version on etsy is a neat pdf version of my free pattern less
